It was a wonderful day to get one step closer to becoming more fluent readers!

Minds Matter Cleveland
April 26, 2016 at 12:43 PM 路

Meet Tyree B.! Tyree, a senior at MC2 STEM High School, will be moving on to attend Baldwin Wallace University in the fall where he plans to major in English and Psychology. Over the course of the past three years, Tyree says Minds Matter has helped him develop the courage to defeat the college process and given him mentors that are now like family to him. In his spare time, Tyree loves to meet new people, dance, and read. He's even a part of the CSU Dance Team, which he plans to continue in college! The Ohio Department of Education released the state rankings for all school districts for Value Added results. Value Added is the school's ability to grow students BEYOND their expected growth target on the OAA. Both E Prep Cliffs and E Prep Woodland Hills ranked in the top 15 school districts in the ENTIRE state of Ohio with school districts like Solon, Upper Arlington, Aurora and Hudson. This puts both E Prep Schools in the top 2% in Value Added for all schools in our state.

Further, when compared with the percentage of students who are categorized as Economically Disadvantaged, E Prep Schools stand out among all the rest.

Simply put, E Prep Schools dispel the myth that poverty prohibits a student's ability to learn and grow at the highest of levels.

Congratulations to our scholars, families, teachers and support staff!
